You hired your people to do a job. If you have to micro-manage them and tell them what to do all the time, then you made a bad hiring decision. Get out of the way of your people and let them do their job. Set the goals, provide guidance, and stay out of the way. It's a challenge for many leaders who think they have to be closely involved or things will go wrong. Get out of the way and let your people surprise you with what they can do. If you've hired right, you will be blown away by their work.

MuteSix is in all in one, data-driven customer acquisition platform .I lead a team of 30+ and we manage performance marketing campaigns and solve complex problems for some of the fastest growing eCommerce brands.My Duties at MuteSix Include: --Manage P&L across all our marketing divisions-Recruit, hire, train, and continuously grow a team that manages $5,000,000+ in monthly performance advertising spend across Facebook, Instagram, Google, Native and Mobile.- Work closely with our teams @Facebook and  @Google to continually stay on top of all ad tech innovations.-Build scalable internal optimization process for conversion rate optimization across multiple digital advertising channels.-Mentor team members for continued personal growth and empowerment.- Speak and present at events around the country on the evolution of performance marketing.

Lead all Paid Media Efforts, PR, Growth.-Managed All Paid User Acquisition Efforts For Social Gaming Publishers and built campaigns that were optimized around acquiring high LTV's users.- Continuously managed campaigns and traffic channels with a goal of lowering gross CPI's by leveraging optimization tactics around audience targeting, was able to cut acquisition costs by over 20% on Facebook.-- Built analytics model to quantify CLV on new users acquired on a per channel and per game basis.-Developed Demand Marketing Funnels For B2B Marketing Acquisition.-Provided Thought Leadership Through Guest Blogging on industry publications including iMediaConnection, MediaPost, DM News, and PocketGamer.Had the opportunity to work with an amazing group of people at PaeDae and was fortunate to most importantly make long-lasting friendships.

•	Managed, built, and optimized campaigns over mobile devices for education lead generation campaigns.•	Managed a team of marketers and developers in the building of an online job portal and built architected the monetization strategy.•	Helped manage over $700,000 + in media buys on affiliate, paid social and search.•	Continuously helped cultivated new affiliate partnerships through wide base of industry wide connections and relationships. Brought in over $300,000 worth of affiliate partnerships.

Responsible for directing all direct response marketing campaigns designed to grow qualified leads and conversions for an online publisher that offers background check software services. •	Created structured user flow for all PPC campaigns with goals of increasing Life time value this included wireframes, email follow up and key performance indicators.•	Developed new landing page funnels for acquisition campaigns on YouTube, Twitter, and Flickr•	Managed campaigns across both Ad networks and CPA networks and bought media on CPC, CPM, and CPA•	Helped architect a new application for background checks and launched the new applications after three (4) months of development.  •	Helped managed six figures in ad-spend budgets on Adwords and Yahoo.

Spearheaded affiliate marketing initiatives, bonding publishers and advertisers in driving lead generation campaigns via pay-per-performance advertising models (i.e. CPL, CPA, CPS, CPI).  •	Added 200+ revenue producing publishers to the network.•	Negotiated media buys with niche under appreciated traffic sources on both CPM,CPC, and CPA and Co-registration•	Helped build revenue up to $500K in the first six (6) months by leverage expertise in co-registration methodology for generating new leads.  •	Helped architect a data management platform, enabling the company to manage client data, adding $175K in one year.•	Teamed with software engineers to develop the company’s custom ad-serving platform to help generate maximum ROI from direct media buys.
